title: 10/25: Start or Sit (AFC); Fun Stats; Crowell's Value (Fantasy Football Podcast)
description:
Starting with a debate: T.Y. Hilton or Keenan Allen rest of season? Then we discuss Isaiah Crowell's value going forward (5:00) and update you on some RB news ... Interesting stats (11:30) about Carson Wentz, Phillip Lindsay and the TB offense as we enter Week 8. Plus more injury news (17:25) that could affect your Fantasy decisions and some emails (21:00) about Week 8 and beyond ... PHI-JAC (27:14), CLE-PIT (34:34), TB-CIN (43:05), IND-OAK (50:30), NE-BUF (56:03), DEN-KC (1:01:28) ... Your emails at fantasyfootball@cbsi.com
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
